channel.title: The Wildy OSRS ECONOMY-PETS-50+ ONLINE-OSRS BOSSES-CUSTOM CONTENT-DEDI SERVER
channel.description:
[CENTER] [img]http://i.imgur.com/XM8kvo3.png[/img]
[URL=http://thewildy.com/][img]http://i.imgur.com/H0sJnha.png[/img][/url]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/LFH2Tg3.png[/img]
Us here at The Wildy want to provide a high quality OSRS experience with a private server twist. We want players to be able to not have to spend grueling hours in order to prepare an account to Pk. Instead we provide many options to achieve those goals easily. We are not a spawn server but have painstakingly thought out many aspects of our economy.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/JzLj8Sa.png[/img] As stated above we are not a spawn server. Every player will be able to spawn four pre-made sets along with food, runes, and potions. The wilderness will provide all necessary financial needs to support and grow the server's economy. *PvP, PvM, and even Skillers will all have use of The Wilderness* to gain access to the most coveted items of the game, while risking it all in the Wilderness.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/gtkD76r.png[/img] Full Bounty Hunter Emblems OSRS Wilderness Bosses OSRS Weapons Correct weapon specials and attacks Weapon and Monster Sounds (beta) Full Clan Chat Bounty Target Teleport && Much more....
[img]http://i.imgur.com/DsvCx80.png[/img] [SPOIL][B][COLOR="#FF0000"]Full Screen[/COLOR][/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/EqXERQL.png[/img]
[B][COLOR="#FF0000"]Vet'ion[/COLOR][/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/9hgT1fO.png[/img]
[B][COLOR="#FF0000"]Scorpia[/COLOR][/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/rtyu44X.png[/img]
[B][COLOR="#FF0000"]Callisto[/COLOR][/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/SZ3f6kw.png[/img]
[B][COLOR="#FF0000"]Zulrah[/COLOR][/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/qHszPyG.png[/img]
[B][COLOR="#FF0000"]Ultimate ironman/regular ironman[/COLOR][/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/w6eKquw.png[/img]
[B][COLOR="#FF0000"]Achievement system[/COLOR][/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/vmPfM8J.png[/img]
[B][COLOR="#FF0000"]Achievement Store[/COLOR][/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/2WESzgF.png[/img]
[B][COLOR="#FF0000"]Prestiege system[/COLOR][/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/hwCCgBU.png[/img][/SPOIL]
[B][COLOR="#00FFFF"]Community Drops[/COLOR][/B] [SPOIL][img]http://i.imgur.com/LkjywTo.jpg[/img]

item.description:
@mmshadow808 wrote:

[CENTER]

XM8kvo3.png723×212

Us here at The Wildy want to provide a high quality OSRS experience with a private server twist. We want players to be able
to not have to spend grueling hours in order to prepare an account to Pk. Instead we provide many options to achieve those goals easily. We
are not a spawn server but have painstakingly thought out many aspects of our economy.


As stated above we are not a spawn server. Every player will be able to spawn four pre-made sets along with food, runes, and potions. The wilderness
will provide all necessary financial needs to support and grow the server’s economy. PvP, PvM, and even Skillers will all have use of The Wilderness
to gain access to the most coveted items of the game, while risking it all in the Wilderness.


Full Bounty Hunter
Emblems
OSRS Wilderness Bosses
OSRS Weapons
Correct weapon specials and attacks
Weapon and Monster Sounds (beta)
Full Clan Chat
Bounty Target Teleport
&&
Much more…
